thread.title_full: Geo News obtains CCTV video of Sehwan suicide bomber | Pakistan - Geo.tv

title: Geo News obtains CCTV video of Sehwan suicide bomber | Pakistan - Geo.tv
text:
Geo News obtains CCTV video of Sehwan suicide bomber | Remains of Sehwan blast victims found lying by nullah 
Geo News has obtained the CCTV video of the suicide bomber of the Lal Shahbaz Qalandar shrine in Sehwan. 
As the video identifies, the suicide bomber first reviewed the security measures from a distance then tried to bypass the lone police official at the entrance of the shrine. The video shows him slipping behind some people as he managed to avoid checking and entered inside. 
As can be seen from the video, there was only one police official for queues of both men and women.
